title: Selecciones del Reader's Digest
additional-notes: This magazine includes reprints and condensations of articles originally published elsewhere.  Those may have their own copyrights, and we have not systematically checked their renewal status.
A 1987 renewal for the 1959 book '33 Ventanas al Mundo', which reprints articles from this magazine, may also cover articles from the book that were published in the magazine in 1959.
A 1988 renewal for the 1960 book 'Aventuras de la Vida Real', which reprints articles from this magazine, may also cover articles from the book that were published in the magazine in 1960.
A 1989 renewal for the 1961 book 'Como Mejorar su Ingles', which reprints articles from this magazine, may also cover articles from the book that were published in the magazine in 1961.
